page.title: 18 Barham Family Life.
page.content: Father has a job in Canterbury,while mother is a housewife working one night a week,and doing seasonal fruit picking on local farms.Two children are at the Primary school.The family actively support PTA events,and father is on the school swimming pool renovation committee.The children are Brownies,attend Sunday School,and go horse-riding at local stables.All are members of the Tennis Club.The family go away on holiday for three weeks each year.Father is Chairman of the Village Society promoting conservation and interest in village life.Mother is a member of the Wives' Club.The whole family participates in the annual Village and School Fetes,setting up and running stalls.Often at weekends the family visit places of interest locally or friends.
